title: Boost Foundation
blurb:
The Boost Foundation is proud to bring you C++Now, a conference known as BoostCon for the first five years of its existence.

The conference was started so that Boost developers and users could meet and discuss face to face. It is now in its second decade of bring C++ experts and enthusiasts from around the world to beautiful Aspen, Colorado for discussions that shape how our code is written in C++.
